edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos

Class FailureDetection<NodeIDType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.FailureDetection<NodeIDType>
  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType -

    FailureDetection provides failure detection for all nodes specified by its sendKeepAlive(.) interface. It really doesn't have much to do with paxos coz it is just a node monitoring utility. It allows the failure detection overhead across all paxos instances on a node to be amortized so that the overhead is no greater than all nodes pinging all other nodes. There is one failure detection instance per machine. This class could be static, but it is not so that we can test emulations involving multiple "machines" within a JVM. Testability: This class is not yet unit-testable. Both PaxosManager and TESTPaxosMain test this class.


    public class FailureDetection<NodeIDType>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    V. Arun
